Mayor ORR
=========

1. ![Orr, Doug](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2232 "Orr, Doug")

   #### Douglas Orr

   Mayor

   [Email Douglas Orr](mailto:dorr@aberdeenwa.gov)

   Phone: [360-537-3227](tel:3605373227)
2. #### Mayor

   **Mailing Address**  
   200 E Market Street  
   City Hall  
   Aberdeen, WA 98520

     

   Phone: [360-537-3227](tel:3605373227)

     

   [Directory](https://www.aberdeenwa.gov/directory.aspx?did=12)

**Office Hours:** Monday - Friday 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM
